triples.name: Unmanned aerial vehicle
triples.relevance: Paper studies sim-to-real transfer of controllers for octorotor UAVs to address safety-critical autonomous flight.

triples.name: Reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: Core machine learning approach used to develop the UAV controller in simulation that is transferred to real-world.

triples.name: Autoencoder
triples.relevance: Neural network architecture applied to analyze measurement data errors between simulated and real flights.

triples.name: Jensen-Shannon divergence
triples.relevance: Statistical metric used to quantify differences between measurement distributions in sim-to-real transfer gap analysis.

triples.name: Transfer learning
triples.relevance: Paper proposes methodology to analyze and quantify sim-to-real gap in controller transfer from simulation to actual UAV.

triples.name: Aircraft flight control system
triples.relevance: Underlying control problem being addressed - maintaining stable flight through disturbance rejection in UAVs.

triples.name: State-space representation
triples.relevance: Mathematical framework used to model state transition dynamics in the neural network-based control analysis.

triples.name: Control theory
triples.relevance: Theoretical foundation for disturbance rejection and controller design in autonomous flight systems.
